fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: During the day, guess a player's role. If you correctly guess it, you will immediately kill them. Required votes to hang someone will be decreased as needed, and their vote will no longer count. The Town will only be told that an Assassin killed your target. If your guess is incorrect, you will kill yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You may only use your ability twice. If your target is immune to your attack, both of you will survive, and the Town will receive no notification.
